title: Vegetation Index
field_map_loading: Loading your saved field and location...
field_map_no_field_title: Draw your field in Farm Selection to see it here.
field_map_no_field_desc_with_location: We will show the exact area you drew on the Farm Selection map. Your current location is marked.
field_map_no_field_desc_without_location: We will show the exact area you drew on the Farm Selection map.
reference_index_subtitle: Field area zones and analysis scale

healthy.title: Excellent Health
healthy.description: Your crop is thriving! Dense, healthy vegetation with optimal chlorophyll levels. Continue current practices.

good.title: Good Health
good.description: Healthy vegetation detected. Crops are growing well with adequate nutrient uptake.

moderate.title: Moderate Stress
moderate.description: Some stress detected. Consider checking for water, nutrient deficiency, or early pest issues.

poor.title: High Stress / Bare Soil
poor.description: Low vegetation or high stress area. May indicate disease, drought, or bare soil. Immediate attention recommended.

healthy.title: Dense Canopy
healthy.description: Very dense vegetation with high biomass. Excellent canopy coverage and plant health.

good.title: Good Canopy
good.description: Good vegetation density. Healthy canopy development with adequate leaf area.

moderate.title: Moderate Density
moderate.description: Moderate vegetation density. May benefit from improved growing conditions.

poor.title: Sparse Vegetation
poor.description: Low vegetation density detected. Check for growth issues or bare soil areas.

healthy.title: Maturity Stage
healthy.description: Crop is in maturity/flowering stage. Monitor for harvest readiness.

good.title: Active Growth
good.description: Strong vegetative growth with high chlorophyll activity. Optimal growing phase.

moderate.title: Early Growth
moderate.description: Early vegetative stage. Ensure adequate nutrients for continued growth.

poor.title: Dormant / Bare
poor.description: Minimal vegetation activity. Could be dormant, harvested, or bare soil.

soil_delete_confirm: Delete this soil record from Realtime ?
soil_delete_failed: Failed to delete record. Try again.
soil_description: Viewing the latest soil packets from `soil` in Realtime. Use Refresh to pull new readings or pick a specific record.
soil_no_data: No soil data found in Realtime DB.
soil_load_failed: Failed to load soil data from Realtime
soil_no_readings: No readings loaded yet. Click “Refresh Latest Data”.
pest_subtitle: Upload a crop image to detect pests & find solutions instantly.
pest_detected_desc: AI detected harmful pest activity in the uploaded image.
pest_safe_desc: AI did not find any harmful pests.
live_subtitle: Upload a leaf image and get instant AI-powered diagnosis.
live_server_error: Server error! Did you enable CORS?
live_diagnosis_desc: AI detected symptoms based on leaf texture.
weather_tip: Tip: Draw your field in "Farm Selection" to get weather for your specific field location.
weather_no_updates: No weather updates available at the moment.
weather_rain_desc: Rain expected around {{time}}. Prepare for wet conditions.
weather_heat_desc: Temperature is {{value}}°C. Ensure irrigation and protect crops from heat stress.
weather_cold_desc: Temperature is {{value}}°C. Protect sensitive crops from frost damage.
weather_wind_desc: Wind speed is {{value}} m/s. Secure structures and protect crops.
weather_humidity_desc: Humidity is {{value}}%. High humidity can promote fungal diseases. Monitor crops closely.
